name: BOXED (Fat Sanic)
description:
Boxed is an action survival horror game for the PC built in a 3D environment with 3D characters, and story where you play as Peter, an ALAS Cargo employee turned survivor in an apocalyptic setting, whose goal is to escape the undead hordes and find the truth behind your unexpected arrival to the parallel world.  

Boxed plays as third-person action survival horror game where the player can roam around the different stages in the game, collect key items and weapons that are used to progress through the narrative experience the game has to offer. The game also explores item management to further the survival element of the game.
